Data: 1.20pm Sri Lanka have won the toss and sent Australia in. An interesting decision to chase under the lights.
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run starts well, landing on a good length and curving the ball away, Gilchrist shouldering arms
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run a tighter one, still that good length but slightly closer to the batsman who waits for it to curl out a touch before defending on the back foot
Vaas to Gilchrist, 1 run oh, took the outside edge at 126kph, the ball shooting wide of the slips as he pressed forward in a would-be drive
Vaas to Hayden, no run some good carry there, the ball finding that good length once more and zinging up and away, Sangakkara taking it on the rise
Vaas to Hayden, no run pushed through again, another dot delivery as it's left on the way through
Vaas to Hayden, no run still no run to him as the batsman waits for the ball just outside off and defends on the back foot
Malinga to Gilchrist, 3 runs starts outside off, the batsman waiting and then moving into the line of the ball which he drives off the back foot on the up through the covers
Malinga to Hayden, no run gets into line on off and defends down off the back foot
Malinga to Hayden, no run gun-barrel straight again, on line with off stick, defended behind off the back foot
Malinga to Hayden, no run slings down across the left hander, the ball forced wide away from him and he leaves it, Sangakkara taking it around his ankles
Malinga to Hayden, no run not much bounce there, the ball ekeing on past the left hander
Malinga to Hayden, 1 run on middle and leg, turned well off the knee to midwicket
Vaas to Hayden, FOUR runs like a rocket. Hayden comes down the track, stands tall and shoulders the ball over mid-off for a firmly, sweetly struck four
Vaas to Hayden, 1 run on middle and off, again Hayden shows his intent by coming out and turning the ball through midwicket

Vaas to Gilchrist, no run but hello, good response from Vaas who hits the deck in line with off and it deviates off the seam with a hint of swing, beating the bat well - and just failing to take the edge
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run outside off, a shortish delivery which is helped into the off-side with a dink off the back foot
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run tightened him up with a good one that was on to him in a hurry, the batsman waiting and defending down off the back foot
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run excellent length again, the ball pitching just outside off and moving away from the left hander who pushes off the back foot, more defensively than anything
Maharoof to Hayden, no run stays over the wicket and plants the ball on a decent length past the batsman who lets it go on through
Maharoof to Hayden, no run outside off, jumped onto a hint of length, driven out to the covers
Maharoof to Hayden, no run flings it down past the left hander once more
Maharoof to Hayden, no run ramrod straight, up there, forces the batsman to bring down his arms very quickly to defend on the back foot
Maharoof to Hayden, no run licks it down off at a good pace, the batsman judges well to leave it
Maharoof to Hayden, no run and again, to round off a good start of a maiden over
Vaas to Gilchrist, 2 runs well bowled, taking the edge through the vacant second slip area, the batsman flashing hard and getting away with it
Vaas to Gilchrist, no run tightened up down off on a good length, defended in the line
Vaas to Gilchrist, OUT Gilchrist advances down the track to meet one which pitched on middle and went on to hit leg as his vain would-be aerial swish towards midwicket got nowhere near the ball
Vaas to Ponting, no run the left armer stays over to the right hander and forces him to defend outside off on the front foot
Vaas to Ponting, no run well bowled again, Ponting lets that one through
Vaas to Ponting, no run swings back in to the right hander, late, and forced up there, Ponting quick to jump into a defence
Maharoof to Hayden, no run good line across the left hander who waits, meets the ball outside off, and defends on the front foot
Maharoof to Hayden, no run good line again, pushed past the left hander on a decent length, and he shoulders arms
Maharoof to Hayden, 1 wide pushed wide down off and it's left alone deliberately as the ball bounces quite high as well
Maharoof to Hayden, no run hits a good length this time, across the left hander, who once more leaves
Maharoof to Hayden, no run continues to plug the off-side channel, the batsman once again leaving it
Maharoof to Hayden, no run waits on off and defends once more, on the front foot
Maharoof to Hayden, no run plenty of wobble as the ball shimmies down past the left hander
Vaas to Ponting, no run flings the ball down the off-side channel from over the wicket, left alone
Vaas to Ponting, no run Ponting is watchful again, the ball slotting on off and pushed up there forcing him to defend on the front foot
Vaas to Ponting, no run dropped! Dilshan in the gully put it down, the ball was outside off and short, Ponting popped up hard and it ran up Dilshan's arms on the forward dive
Vaas to Ponting, no run outside off, an angled bat on the front-foot defensive
Vaas to Ponting, no run short ball on off, defended on the back foot now
Vaas to Ponting, no run on off, rises onto the back foot and defends down
Maharoof to Hayden, no run pushed well again past the left hander who makes an elaborate gesture of a leave
Maharoof to Hayden, 2 runs too straight on middle and leg, Hayden tucks it off the legs and has already set off as Jayasuriya runs round to do the tidying up
Maharoof to Hayden, 1 run driven out to mid-off and there was a chance of a run-out there, Hayden was struggling and had to dive in the end, a direct hit from Malinga would have been comfortably out
Maharoof to Ponting, no run down the off-side channel and Ponting judges well, and early, to leave it
Maharoof to Ponting, 2 runs on middle and leg, Ponting comes down the track and turns the ball out through the 45, not the most convincing shot
Maharoof to Ponting, no run steps outside off and exaggerates the leave with the bat high in the air
Vaas to Hayden, no run pushed down the off-side channel on a good length and there's a hint of swing back in
Vaas to Hayden, no run swing into the lefthander who defends on the back foot
Vaas to Hayden, no run some curl away from the left hander who defends on the front foot this time
Vaas to Hayden, FOUR runs shortish on middle and leg, just a hint of room which is enough for Hayden to fashion some kind of room in turning the ball through the 45
Vaas to Hayden, no run a touch outside off this time, Hayden waits and moves into the line of the ball, defending back down off the back foot
Vaas to Hayden, no run movement away outside off, but only just, defended on the back foot down
Maharoof to Ponting, no run good length on off, defended on the front foot, right down the line
Maharoof to Ponting, no run right through him, regulation delivery down off, Ponting pushes out away from his body and the ball jinks between bat and pad
Maharoof to Ponting, no run outside off, defended on the front foot this time
Maharoof to Ponting, 2 runs width outside off, cut hard to the fielder who knocked it down and they come back for a comfortable two, poor from Jayasuriya who had a gaping hole in his long barrier
Maharoof to Ponting, no run in line with off, defended on the front foot now
Maharoof to Ponting, no run overpitched a touch on off, driven out to mid-off
Vaas to Hayden, no run on off, waits on the back foot to push out to mid-on, rock-solid defensive play
Vaas to Hayden, no run outside off, on the back foot, played down to the gully
Vaas to Hayden, no run advances down the track, looking for a huge booming drive through mid-off, but is tucked up by the length and has to settle for a gentle drive
Vaas to Hayden, no run outside off, decent length, defended down
Vaas to Hayden, 1 run a touch down leg and Hayden thumps behind square leg where the ball bounces once on its way to the fielder, deviates, and is jumped on well and returned
Vaas to Ponting, no run a play and a miss, an ugly shot from Ponting who gets on the back foot and tries to cut off the back foot to point
Maharoof to Hayden, no run starts wideish of the crease over the wicket and doesn't bring it back in enough, the batsman defending forward
Maharoof to Hayden, no run on off and middle, defended forward
Maharoof to Hayden, no run on off and middle again, more good length and defended on the front foot
Maharoof to Hayden, no run full delivery, almost a yorker, Hayden clamps down on it with a forward defensive
Maharoof to Hayden, no run tidy delivery yet again and Hayden waits to defend on the back foot
Maharoof to Hayden, 1 run advances down, meets the ball outside off and presses off the front foot to square and they gratefully take the opportunity to push the stagnating score on
Malinga to Hayden, no run on the shiny button immediately, and the batsman can only leave it
Malinga to Hayden, no run jumped into the line of the ball outside off and defended on the back foot
Malinga to Hayden, no run fired across him, up there, and defended on the front foot
Malinga to Hayden, no run outside off, played off the back foot out to point
Malinga to Hayden, no run outside off, pushes him on to the back foot in defence
Malinga to Hayden, no run swung past the right hander, width enough to leave

Maharoof to Ponting, no run wide down off and Ponting could have left it to get the extra, but I expect he tried to play it to get used to getting bat on ball - as it was he hardly got any contact on what would have been a cut
Maharoof to Ponting, no run good slower ball, Ponting picks it and brushes out a mid-on drive, Vaas slings back in to the non-striker's and just misses
Maharoof to Ponting, 1 run slower ball, a brush of an on-drive, Vaas at mid-on nearly takes the sticks
Maharoof to Hayden, 1 run a big shot now, Hayden down and heaped it out to square, but not quite connecting in the end
Maharoof to Ponting, 1 run outside off, Ponting waits and presses out to point where Malinga comes round and wings back in
Maharoof to Hayden, no run pushed across him, Hayden steps to the side like a 1980s aerobic move and works the ball down off the back foot into the off-side
Malinga to Ponting, 3 runs outside off, a better shot from Ponting who waits and forces down through point where it's chased down inside the boundary
Malinga to Hayden, FOUR runs on middle, Hayden rockets it hard through midwicket with a swivel
Malinga to Hayden, 3 runs outside off, Hayden waits for it on the back foot and cuts well through the off-side and they return for an easy two
Malinga to Ponting, no run very good delivery, almost a yorker, on off and defended on the front foot
Malinga to Ponting, no run outside off, a short ball and rising, Ponting eases it off the back foot to point
Malinga to Ponting, no run short ball, nearly a wide it was so high, and Ponting goes for the hook outside off but it was past him before he'd played the shot

Maharoof to Hayden, OUT slower ball deceives Hayden, pushed across him and the batsman was looking to work the ball to leg from outside off, instead popping up to cover where Silva takes a good catch, leaving the ground to take it over his head
Maharoof to Clarke, no run comes out and defends on the front foot now
Maharoof to Clarke, no run pushed down the channel, left alone
Maharoof to Clarke, 1 run swing in to the right hander, tucking him up, he squeezes back out to mid-on where a direct hit would have had him well out, Clarke losing the bat as he ran through
Maharoof to Ponting, 2 runs outside off and Ponting clips it back off his legs through midwicket
Maharoof to Ponting, no run fired on the off-side, good length, tidied back down on the front foot
Malinga to Clarke, no run more good bowling, fast and flat on off, defended on the front foot
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run angling down leg, clipped off the ankles to square
Malinga to Ponting, no run outside off, driven hard into the ground towards point where Dilshan fields very well to cut it off
Malinga to Ponting, no run dug into the ground back towards the bowler
Malinga to Ponting, no run swivelled in outside off, on the dot again, defended into the ground off the back foot
Malinga to Ponting, no run straight, short and defended back down
Maharoof to Clarke, no run nipped back in from outside off, defended back down
Maharoof to Clarke, no run right up there, defended on the front foot
Maharoof to Clarke, no run outside off, tight, driven back to mid-off
Maharoof to Clarke, no run slower ball, good loop, outside off and a good length and defended forward
Maharoof to Clarke, 1 run outside off, pushed out to the covers where the fielder gets a left hand to it and they scamper through

Maharoof to Ponting, OUT great fielding there, a mix-up between the batsmen as Ponting pushes forward and wants the single. Maharoof dives out to his right to stop the ball and as it dribbles away from him he recovers and flings hard to Sangakkara who does the honours
Vaas to Clarke, no run finds the dot immediately, defended on the front foot
Vaas to Clarke, no run more defence on the front foot
Vaas to Clarke, no run more defence
Vaas to Clarke, 2 runs on leg, turned out behind square
Vaas to Clarke, no run driven out to the covers on the front foot
Vaas to Clarke, 2 runs turned down leg to short fine leg
Maharoof to Symonds, no run slower ball, well judged because the batsman was temporarily fooled, just tucking the ball up slightly but down safe to the covers
Maharoof to Symonds, no run pushed down the off-side, left alone
Maharoof to Symonds, 1 run outside off, a quick push down and they run through, hari-kiri-style as the bowler underarms on to the stumps at the striker's end, but Clarke was just in
Maharoof to Clarke, no run pushed off the back foot into the covers
Maharoof to Clarke, 2 runs on middle, turned off the legs behind square where Amerasinghe chases and his pursuit is successful
Maharoof to Clarke, no run on middle, turned to midwicket
Vaas to Symonds, 2 runs on off, shortish and pulled through midwicket
Vaas to Symonds, 1 run outside off, and cut down off the back foot through gully
Vaas to Clarke, no run stayed over, pushed across the right hander, who drove out to the covers
Vaas to Clarke, no run driven out to the covers off the back foot
Vaas to Clarke, no run pushed to point off the back foot
Vaas to Clarke, no run outside off, a touch short, cut hard to point off the back foot

Maharoof to Symonds, OUT a huge call from Sangakkara as he believes Symonds inside-edged just a feather through to him and indeed he has, his feet trapped in the crease as he fended away from his body to the ball which came outside off on a good length
Maharoof to Hussey, no run squares Hussey up first ball, defended somehow
Maharoof to Hussey, no run defended on the front foot this time
Maharoof to Hussey, no run straight on leg, defended on the front foot now
Maharoof to Hussey, no run ..but he clicks now with one which jinks past the outside edge on the front foot
Maharoof to Hussey, 1 run comes out on the front foot, drives to mid-off and steals the strike courtesy of a hash from Malinga
Murali to Hussey, no run good start from Murali, on middle and pushed past into the off-side
Murali to Hussey, no run outside off, cut out to point, Hussey not quite getting hold of it
Murali to Hussey, 1 run looped up on to leg, pushed out in front of square
Murali to Clarke, no run outside off, some room, the batsman rocks back and cuts into the covers
Murali to Clarke, 1 run vicious rip back into the batsman from outside off and Clarke moves back again to give himself room to cut back out into the off-side
Murali to Hussey, 1 run good loop again up there in front of middle, and driven back out square
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run pushed across him on off, full delivery, driven out to mid-off
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 1 wide a very wide down off, looks like he just slipped, Malinga went to give him an encouraging pat
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run down off again, this one less wide and left down the channel
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, FOUR runs overpitched on off, and Hussey drives well through the covers, picking the gap well
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run outside off, driven out to the covers again, but doesn't pick the gap
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run waits on off, meets a short one with a back-foot defensive in line with off
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run bends it down off, a neat length which earns a clap from Sangakkara
Murali to Clarke, 1 run on off, waits and cuts out to point, rocking to make himself some room
Murali to Hussey, 1 run outside off, good length, but pushed to the covers, the batsmen setting off immediately
Murali to Clarke, 1 run comes out to the covers
Murali to Hussey, no run let it go on a good length past off
Murali to Hussey, 1 run squeezed out to the covers and they are quick off the mark
Murali to Clarke, no run on off, pushed over to short midwicket
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run pushed hard down off, left alone
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run fired up straight, defended on the front foot again. Not much width today
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run good length, opens the face and the ball just licks past the outside edge
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 1 run dropped down in front of him, they run through the quick single
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 run outside off, Clarke gets a big edge up high and hard over to third man as he tried to club over mid-on off the front foot, Vaas can't get round to it in time
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run outside off, defended back down off the back foot
Murali to Clarke, 1 run comes out to meet the ball on off for an easy single, driven out to mid-on
Murali to Hussey, 1 run round the wicket, Hussey picks the ball from off to fine leg with a cute dink
Murali to Clarke, 1 run driven out to long-off without much fuss
Murali to Hussey, 3 runs in the air a touch from the late cut, but safe down on to third man
Murali to Clarke, no run pushes him back into the crease, the ball ripping away from the right hander but also from the stumps
Murali to Clarke, 2 runs cracker from Clarke, quick eyes and hands, cutting a back-of-a-length ball from middle stump
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run let it go down off, the batsman shouldering arms as a good-length delivery goes on its merry way
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 2 runs touch more width outside off, cut out well through the gully on the crouch and they risk a second
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run defended down on off
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run right up there on middle and off, forces the defensive
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run zoomed up well again, defended forward
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 1 run just outside leg, turned back down through fine leg
Murali to Hussey, no run driven out to the covers now
Murali to Hussey, no run defenfds solidly on the front foot
Murali to Hussey, 1 run worked well into the gap on the off-side
Murali to Clarke, no run pushed on to the pads, looked to turn it out to midwicket but wasn't quick enough
Murali to Clarke, 1 run driven out straight this time
Murali to Hussey, 1 run good loop, pushed to short midwicket
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run good ball on off, driven out to straight long-off
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 2 runs outside off, turned down backward of point and they run two to Murali's arm
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 1 run the same shot but this time Murali is wise to it, and they take only the single
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 run short on off and Clarke pulls it from outside off round through midwicket
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 1 run a pinched single from a press forward
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, no run outside off tempts Clarke into the air-drive outside off
Murali to Hussey, no run on off, turns wider, Hussey watches it all the way through
Murali to Hussey, no run pushed up there, defended on the back foot
Murali to Hussey, 1 run swept round now on the swivel
Murali to Clarke, 1 run a tuoch overpitched, driven out to mid-on
Murali to Hussey, no run let it go through down off
Murali to Hussey, 1 run outside off, turned to short midwicket, Murali misses with the shy
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run tidy first ball after drinks, defended forward
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 1 run quiet again, defended on the front foot now
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, no run more defence, Clarke getting forward to press into the covers this time, straight to the fielder
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, FOUR runs outside off, Clarke picks it up early and whips it back in front of midwicket, just wide of mid-on and on its way it goes, creamily
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, no run pushes him onto the backfoot to drive into the covers
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 run short ball dabbed down off the back foot into the covers and he shuffles through to take the strike
Murali to Clarke, no run pushes him onto the back foot, worked out to midwicket
Murali to Clarke, 1 run a quick single this time and back in safely
Murali to Hussey, no run pushed across him, defended forward
Murali to Hussey, no run more of the same
Murali to Hussey, no run and yet again
Murali to Hussey, no run pushed across him and he lets it go on on a good length
Malinga to Clarke, no run up there on off, driven out to mid-on
Malinga to Clarke, no run on a good length, pushed forward on the front foot, the fielder coming across to cut it off
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run pushed out on the back foot to mid-off, they took a risk there, a direct hit was gone at the non-striker's
Malinga to Hussey, no run speared down the channel, left alone
Malinga to Hussey, no run too quick on to him, the ball on his thighs in front of off and the ball nearly got trapped in his pad
Malinga to Hussey, no run lets it through down the channel on the rise
Murali to Clarke, 1 run uses his feet very well to meet the pitch of the ball on off, driven out hard to mid-off where Amerasinghe oophs it back in
Murali to Hussey, 2 runs Hussey makes room to work it to midwicket
Murali to Hussey, 1 run on middle, driven out forward and well fielded
Murali to Clarke, no run on leg, up there, pushed into the leg-side
Murali to Clarke, 1 run outside off, cut hard to point, more good footwork there
Murali to Hussey, 1 run width outside off, cut hard to deep point
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run straight again, but there's another quick single and they are through quickly with hardly any alarm, the batsman just dropping the ball down
Malinga to Clarke, no run hostile bouncer, sharp, quick and the batsman did well to duck
Malinga to Clarke, FOUR runs advanced down the pitch late and waited for the short ball before launching that hard over mid-on, hiitting through the line with a very clean, attractive shot indeed
Malinga to Clarke, FOUR runs foure more, down the leg and turned off the hips
Malinga to Clarke, no run Malinga responds with a good straight yorker, dug out in front of middle
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run another yorker, or at least it would be, dug out with a careful drive to mid-off
Vaas to Clarke, no run stays over, fires across Clarke who's tightened up in front of off and defended on the front foot
Vaas to Clarke, FOUR runs ooh, some luck for Clarke who comes out, looking to drive on the front foot through mid-off and instead the ball crashes hard wide of the sticks off an inside edge
Vaas to Clarke, 1 run comes outside off and drives on the front foot through the covers, connecting properly this time
Vaas to Hussey, 1 run tight on off but Hussey manages to make some room by late-cutting through the gully
Vaas to Clarke, 1 run straight delivery on middle, Clarke drives out to mid-on
Vaas to Hussey, 1 run nips back in from outside off, defended on the front foot
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 1 run full delivery on off, driven out and they run well through
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 run short on middle and leg, swivelled round off the back foot through square
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 1 run on the legs, turned out square
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 run outside off, driven out to long-off for a comfortable single
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 2 runs some movement in the air, overpitched a touch, Hussey drives out to long-off and Malinga tidies up
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 1 run on middle and leg squeezed out to midwicket
Malinga to Hussey, no run slung wide outside off at yorkerable length, but left alone
Malinga to Hussey, no run driven out to mid-off, good fielding there by Perera and Hussey has to get back into his crease quickly
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run pushed into the off-side off the back foot
Malinga to Clarke, no run outside off, Clarke backs away too far looking for his customary cut
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run full delivery, driven out to mid-off
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run through past the keeper, a wide edge, the first hint of anything Australia have given in a while, this wasn't quite a chance
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 1 run pushes across the left hander from over the wicket, Hussey tries to pull, gets horribly cramped up and the ball flies off, sighing
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 wide wide down leg, Clarke gamely chases it round but is too late on the shot
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 run on off, driven out to mid-on for a well-crafted, important fifty and Clarke takes in the applause
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run down off, left alone
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 2 runs the ball didn't come on to the bat on off, pulled out in front of mdiwcket, and they get the two, Hussey wants the three, but Clarke is correct in sending him back
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run pushed out to the covers, driven into the ground and up to the fielder who's watchful where the non-striker's end is concerned, Clarke runs back into his crease
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 2 runs reaches out on middle to tuck into midwicket
Murali to Clarke, OUT low full toss and Clarke's eyes light up as he drives hard at Murali whose upturned hands pushed it up and then he collects at the second time
Murali to Hopes, no run on the front foot, sweeps slowly into the leg-side
Murali to Hopes, no run a half-appeal for one which hits the batsman low
Murali to Hopes, 1 run finally gets hold of the sweep properly with a working to square
Murali to Hussey, 2 runs dips on to leg, pushed out to midwicket and the pair do well to come back for the two
Murali to Hussey, 1 run waits for the one which comes on middle and he drives out to mid-on for another important fifty following Clarke's
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 1 run up there on off, driven back to mid-off who gets two hands' worth of fingertips on the ball and they scramble the single
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, 2 runs driven out off the legs to midwicket
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, no run outside off, curved away, a play and a miss as Hopes tried to drive to the covers
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, no run good-length ball, check-driven into the covers
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, 1 run banged down wide outside off, cut hard to deep point
Malinga to Hopes, 2 runs full delivery, popped up a leading edge just wide of cover, Hopes angling the face as he went for the drive
Malinga to Hopes, 1 run on leg, a would-be yorker whipped round off the legs behind square
Malinga to Hussey, 1 bye outside off, Hussey can't get on to it and Sangakkara gets the end of a glove on it, the batsmen cheeking through a single

Malinga to Hopes, 1 run pushed out to the covers and yet again there's a run out chance from Perera, the ball bouncing over the stumps and into Malinga who could have taken it, the run out was on if so
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run into the covers this time and though the ball hit the stumps Hussey was well home
Malinga to Hopes, no run driven into his ankle and back towards Malinga
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 1 run outside off, pulled round through midwicket, thrown back to the bowler
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, 1 run pushed up there outside off, driven out to long on
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 1 run outside off, driven quietly to the covers
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hopes, 1 run outside off, pushed to short midwicket and they run through
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run outside off, Hussey was looking to hustle, Amerasinghe singing as the ball was driven sharply into the ground with more than a hint of defence
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 2 runs down leg and got hold of it this time with a work round through leg
Murali to Clarke, 1 run pushes him back into the crease with the length, Clarke squeezing out from middle into midwicket
Murali to Hussey, no run and again, this is good tight bowling and defended on the back foot
Murali to Hussey, no run up there once more, on off, defended forward
Murali to Hussey, no run lets that one go down the channel
Murali to Hussey, no run on leg, turning in, defended back down off the back foot
Murali to Hussey, 1 run deliberately gives it some extra air outside off, driven out to mid-off, they go for the run and get back in comfortably from the quick single
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run defended well on the back foot
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, no run tidy delivery, defended on the front foot
MKDI Amerasinghe to Hussey, 1 run good movement just away from the left hander who waits, crouches and opens the face to glide the ball through the gully region
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, no run tight one, rising outside off, Clarke defends back down
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, no run some swing in the air and the ball radars in on off and middle, driven back out to mid-on
MKDI Amerasinghe to Clarke, 1 run some swing back in on a short one but Clarke was already on to the pull through midwicket
Murali to Hopes, 1 run up there on leg, pushed behind square, and they ran through
Murali to Hussey, 1 run right up there on middle and leg, turned off the legs to fine

Murali to Hopes, OUT on off, pushed a quicker ball past him, Hopes was bamboozled going for the sweep and then wandered out of his crease, possibly looking for the bye, meanwhile Sangakkara almost apologetically, though he gives no inch, took the bails off
Murali to Hogg, 1 run Hogg takes the single with a dab to gully and the throw was just wide, Hogg would have been well gone
Murali to Hussey, no run cramped up there, defended on the front foot
Murali to Hussey, 1 bye goes for the sweep outside off, the ball misses him, Sangakkara misses the ball and they run through the bye
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run driven out through long-off now
Malinga to Hogg, no run a yorker outside off, worked out to gully where Dilshan fielded well on the dive
Malinga to Hogg, 3 runs outside off, backs away a touch and cover-drives, the relay throw comes in, Perera muffs it and allows an extra one
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run pushed up there on off, driven out to long-off this time
Malinga to Hogg, OUT outside off, and that's the catch of the day, cut hard to point and it was travelling low, Dilshan snaps it up sharply around his ankles on the kneel
Malinga to Johnson, no run very good yorker, dug out well also
Vaas to Hussey, 1 run half volley, driven up and over to long-on
Vaas to Johnson, 1 run driven out to mid-on now
Vaas to Hussey, 1 run dug out from a near yorker, driven out straight to long-off
Vaas to Johnson, 2 runs on middle and that was dropped by Malinga at mid-on, should have had that, fumbling it on the finger tips with upturned hands
Vaas to Johnson, no run cramped him up outside leg, Johnson didn't know where the rebound went, looked for a quick single and was sent back as Vaas went for the underarm
Vaas to Johnson, 1 run wideish outside off, driven into the covers now
Malinga to Johnson, no run a good ball from Malinga, on off, left went to cut hard, a bit of reverse swing
Malinga to Johnson, no run couldn't sneak a single as the ball's driven back to Malinga
Malinga to Johnson, 1 run outside off, cut hard to point and a direct hit would have been close as Hussey slides in at full stretch
Malinga to Hussey, 2 runs wide outside off and a misfield in the covers where the man dives over it and they pick up the two
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run outside off, driven wide of long-off who throws in hard to prevent the second run
Malinga to Johnson, 1 run yorker, followed him behind the stumps as he backed away and squeezed it out onto the leg-side

Credit to Sri Lanka's bowlers who have done so well throughout, bowling so well as a unit and didn't let up in the field, although they couldn't quite connect with any of the direct hits. Hussey and Clarke are the only batsmen to emerge with any real credit, both striking what could be crucial fifties in a lowish run chase.
Welcome back. Sri Lanka's openers are set. Target is 185. Nathan Bracken has the ball.
Bracken to Perera, no run thats a superb start, full and coming back in to catch Perera on the front pad, was swinging down a lot and height was probably a factor
Bracken to Perera, no run this one's straighter and tucked to the man at midwicket
Bracken to Perera, no run springs off a good length and Perera leaves it be for Gilchrist
Bracken to Perera, no run a tad fuller and Perera meets it with a firm defensive shot to cover
Bracken to Perera, no run beaten, as he shapes to defend but the ball lifts and zips away
Bracken to Perera, no run this one's on the stumps and he thuds bat and pad together
Clark to Sangakkara, no run extra pace and carry beats him as he pushes down the wrong line
Clark to Sangakkara, no run good delivery, comes back in and Sangakkara works it to midwicket
Clark to Sangakkara, no run hits a length and squares him up, the ball flies to point along the turf
Clark to Sangakkara, no run hint of movement as the ball angles across and lifts considerably again, Sangakkara again plays down the wrong line and misses
Clark to Sangakkara, no run its all happening, as Clark seams it off a length and beats Sangakkara again, to end another maiden over, this one a successful venture for Australia
Bracken to Perera, no run gets forward and drives a fuller one to the man at cover
Bracken to Perera, no run my that one kicked! Good bounce and the ball climbs through to Gilchrist after it gets Perera fending off the back foot
Bracken to Perera, no run this one also beats him off a length, the bat just hanging out there limply
Bracken to Perera, 1 run straighter and fuller, Perera gets off the mark with a nudge to leg
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run short of a length and he gets in line to defend it back to Bracken
Bracken to Sangakkara, 2 runs bit too straight and he turns it wide of Hogg at mid-on for two

Clark to Perera, OUT and he gets another, pitching on the stumps and trapping Perera, not getting far forward as he goes for a flick, in front of about leg stump ... Rudy Koertzen slowly raises the finger to cue cheers from the partisan crowd ... height is a factor on that one ... lets just wait for a replay ... yes, he wa
Clark to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run gets back in his crease and turns one to square leg
Clark to Sangakkara, 1 run gets forward and edges down towards third man for one
Clark to Mahela Jayawardene, no run again he gets pushed back in his crease and works to midwicket
Clark to Mahela Jayawardene, no run gets back and defends the ball towards point
Clark to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run full on the pads and thats an effortless clip out to deep square leg

Bracken to Sangakkara, no run back of a length just outside off and he defends it to point
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run thats a good length but wide enough for him to leave it alone
Bracken to Sangakkara, 1 run defends and gets a thick edge along the ground through gully
Bracken to Mahela Jayawardene, no run gets forward and leaves that one be, off a length
Bracken to Mahela Jayawardene, no run on off stump and Jayawardene presses forward to defend
Clark to Sangakkara, 3 runs bit of width, he drives on the up in the gap between cover and point
Clark to Mahela Jayawardene, no run gets forward and defends the ball to the man at mid-on
Clark to Mahela Jayawardene, no run
Clark to Mahela Jayawardene, no run a bit too wide of off stump, moving away, and he leaves it be
Clark to Mahela Jayawardene, no run hits a length again but its wide enough for him to leave again
Clark to Mahela Jayawardene, no run too straight and he drives down to a diving Hogg at mid-on
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run short of a length on the stumps, worked off the back foot to square leg
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run a punchy back-foot drive to a short one, but right to Symonds at cover
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run uses his feet and on-drives a fuller one to the fielder on the ring

Johnson to Sangakkara, 2 runs slashed and dropped by Symonds in the covers! The ball comes onto Sangakkara quicker than anticipated and he drives on the rise, but the fielder cannot hold on as he flings himself around, would have been a stunning left-handed take
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run defended on the front foot
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run full and slipping down leg stump, raps him on the pads but the umpire feels it was doing a bit too much so he shakes his head
Clark to Mahela Jayawardene, no run typically straight, defended on the front foot in front of off
Clark to Mahela Jayawardene, no run more defence
Clark to Mahela Jayawardene, no run this time he looks to launch into a straight drive to mid-off
Clark to Mahela Jayawardene, no run on middle, good line and length, comes out and defends on the front foot
Clark to Mahela Jayawardene, no run defended on the front foot with a firm bat which is aimed towards the covers

Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run pushed across the right hander who stays on the back foot and pushes to gully for no run
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 3 runs angles across and way past the batsman who stabs out at it with a forceful cover drive and he stopped running because he thought he had the four
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run drags it a touch short down off, cut hard to point off the back foot

Clark to Sangakkara, no run whistles past the batsman's outside edge at a fair lick

Clark to Mahela Jayawardene, no run food line again, down off, left well alone

Johnson to Sangakkara, no run slower ball prompts the forward defensive
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run good bounce this time on off, the ball rising up from a short pitch, and hustled back down on the back foot

Hopes to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run some width outside off, helped out through third man off the back foot

Hopes to Mahela Jayawardene, no run angled into the right hander, who drives back out to the covers, picking out the fielder
Hopes to Mahela Jayawardene, no run outside off, can't pierce the off-side ring this time either, straight to the man at cover
Hopes to Mahela Jayawardene, no run nips back in again off the seam, Jayawardene is patient in defence, worked to the covers
Hopes to Mahela Jayawardene, no run cuts back in a touch again, on a good length, defended on the front foot

Hopes to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs Jayawardene pierces the field with a knife blade, driving through the chink of light in front of point and Hayden pursues
Hopes to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs on off, Jayawardene comes out and plays back round through backward square - forced to do something different on the emptier leg-side

Hopes to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run driven back past the bowler, slowly, and as the ball is rolling slowly towards the mid-off so Jayawardene calls Sangakkara through and, captain's privilege, steals the strike
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run width outside off, driven out to point
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs hey now, Jayawardene finds the rope for the first time in a while, leaning into a most glorious cover drive
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run oh, good ball from Johnson, just about leaping over the outside edge as Jayawardene shapes to launch into another full-blooded drive
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run short ball rises up outside off, it's half-fended, half-guided down to third man
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run pushed full on off, and driven silkily out to mid-off
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run short on off and Sangakkara takes periscopically evasive action, ducking down and leaving his bat pointing upwards like a flower
Hopes to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs outside off, inside edged back over the stumps and the ball will run away with Hopes' hopes of taking a wicket that ball
Hopes to Mahela Jayawardene, no run cut back in again and once more Jayawardene inside edges, but safely
Hopes to Mahela Jayawardene, no run outside off, pushed up on a good length, driven back out to the covers on the up
Hopes to Mahela Jayawardene, no run curved from middle out towards off on a good length, tucked back down off the back foot
Hopes to Mahela Jayawardene, no run pushed him onto the back foot in a line just outside off, defended back down
Hopes to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs on middle, and Jayawardene improvises well by swivelling round and helping the ball through fine leg
Bracken to Sangakkara, 1 run stays over predictably enough, shuffled into the covers off the back foot thanks to a hint of width and a good eye

Bracken to Mahela Jayawardene, OUT pushed across him at a tightish line and a nagging, awkward spit up to Jayawardene who tries to cut but it climbs on him too quickly and he flashes a top edge through to Gilchrist who takes it and throws the ball in the air in celebration
Bracken to Silva, no run across him, a good length, and defended on the front foot
Bracken to Silva, no run defended tight on the front foot, the ball pitching in line with off
Bracken to Silva, no run defended on the front foot

Hopes to Sangakkara, no run good length, up there on off, and it's defended forward
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run well bowled on off, good discipline, tucked with a defensive clip into short midwicket
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run some wobble in the air, pushed out to mid-off

Hopes to Sangakkara, no run outside off and took the outside edge as the ball bounced way in front of Gilchrist, not much bounce on this surface. The non-striker's bails came off as Hopes clipped down on his delivery
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run defended on the front foot now
Hopes to Sangakkara, no run worked out on the back foot to the cover fielder in the ring
Johnson to Silva, 1 wide a wide down off
Johnson to Silva, no run good angle across the right hander, who leaves it
Johnson to Silva, no run good shape across him, awkward enough to make him push at it defensively, the ball rolling into the covers
Johnson to Silva, no run outside off, goes for a cover drive and the hotspot camera shows it hit the ground rather than the outside edge
Johnson to Silva, no run pushed through outside off this time
Johnson to Silva, 1 leg bye on middle and leg, rising, and turned off the legs through fine leg - literally as it happens, that was a leg bye
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run banged in a short one to end this over's proceedings, the ball flashing down off past the grille
Hopes to Silva, no run a good length on off, comes across to meet the ball and defends into the covers
Hopes to Silva, no run right up therein line with middle and off, defended on the front foot
Hopes to Silva, no run outside off, poor timing, pushing straight into the ground, his head rising with the shot, too
Hopes to Silva, no run pushed up there again on good length, defended on the front foot
Hopes to Silva, no run good line on off, tight length to boot and it's defended on the front foot
Hopes to Silva, no run banged in a well-directed short ball that followed the batsman and leapt over the sticks
Bracken to Sangakkara, 1 run defended on the front foot in line with off
Bracken to Silva, 1 run driven forward to mid-off
Bracken to Sangakkara, 1 run outside off, soft hands cut down the ball through gully off the back foot

Bracken to Silva, no run on off, cut into the batsman woh stands firm and defends

Hogg to Silva, no run right up there on off, defended forward quietly
Hogg to Silva, 1 run some aggression from Sangakkara who launches a strong pull through to deep midwicket
Hogg to Sangakkara, 1 run on leg, turned out off the legs quietly to square leg
Hogg to Silva, no run oh, nearly a stumping there as Silva is deceived down off by Hogg and just about gets his foot back down behind the line. He breathes another day
Hogg to Silva, no run pushed forward to mid-off this time
Bracken to Sangakkara, 1 run defended on the front foot this time
Bracken to Silva, no run on off, tucked in the air for a second but bounced in front of Hussey at square

Bracken to Silva, 3 runs a touch of width outside off and it's swiped straight across the line in front of midwicket
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run up there and defended on the front foot
Bracken to Sangakkara, no run stopped on the shot outside off, driven out to mid-on slowly
Hogg to Silva, no run bent in on middle, driven out with a pish to the on-side and they scamper through like young scamps
Hogg to Silva, 2 runs bulls-eyed on middle, but Silva is equal to the sweep behind square
Hogg to Silva, 2 runs repeats the shot, just a lap round the corner to fine leg
Hogg to Silva, no run outside off, opened the face to guide it down ot third man
Hogg to Silva, 1 run opened the face to run it down to the gully region this time, first slip runs out in pursuit
Hogg to Sangakkara, 1 run loop on leg, and turned off the toes square

Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run outside off and Sangakkara is nearly run out - twice. Firstly he dabbed just in front of point and there wasn't much in Clarke's shy, then they throw the overthrow ball out to the non-striker's end where Sangakkara has now scrambled
Hopes to Silva, 1 run on off, defended forward
Hopes to Sangakkara, 1 run outside off, stands tall and runs it down through the vacant gully area

Hopes to Dilshan, 1 run on off and Dilshan is off the mark straight away with a forward press that catches the inside edge and veers off square
Hogg to Dilshan, 2 runs nudged it behind him for an easy two
Hogg to Dilshan, 1 run eased out forward
Hogg to Silva, no run this one just drops short of Hayden at first slip who moved well to his right
Hogg to Silva, 1 run dragged it a touch short and that's walloped in front of midwicket, Hussey tidies up
Hogg to Dilshan, no run ooh, past him down off, a yorker which surprised Gilchrist when Dilshan missed it and he would have been well well out
Hogg to Dilshan, no run this one bounced a bit more than anticipated and Gilchrist appeals for the stumping but he is safe
Hopes to Silva, no run driven out to the covers, no run on though
Hopes to Silva, no run pushed out to the covers once more
Hopes to Silva, 1 run turned off the legs to square
Hopes to Dilshan, no run tight delivery, driven out to mid-off
Hopes to Dilshan, no run lets that one through on a good length down off

Hogg to Silva, no run psuhed forward on the front foot
Hogg to Silva, no run another dot ball
Hogg to Silva, no run tightened up there, driven out to point
Hogg to Silva, no run backs well away outside off, pushed to the covers and roundly tidied up
Hogg to Silva, no run good loop on leg, turned out to short midwicket

Johnson to Dilshan, 1 run width outside off, whipped over gully with a deliberate aerial steer
Johnson to Silva, no run pushes to gully on the front foot, they set off, then both head back
Johnson to Silva, 1 run outside off, pushed on to the leg side, straight forward, Johnson runs round, turns and shies but the batsman is home
Johnson to Dilshan, no run pushed forward now
Johnson to Dilshan, 1 run low full toss, driven out behind point
Hogg to Dilshan, no run played out off the front foot to the covers
Hogg to Dilshan, 1 run they squeeze out a single to short midwicket and charge through

8.45pm Heavy drizzle and now the players come off, the groundstaff come on. Sri Lanka are 25 behind on D/L right now.

8.55pm C'mon, someone's gotta have a worse joke than Geoff. Just to clarifying, meanwhile, that if there's no resumption, Australia will win on D/L by 24 runs. Lots of fairweather fans have already deserted the G.

9.35pm Regarding the cut-off time, patience my pretties. I'll tell you as soon as someone's told me. Crowd figures meanwhile, there were 27,854 here, which is low for Melbourne on a Friday. Easily half of those must now have left, though. Australia are on for the 24-run win.
9.45pm Channel Nine are now showing highlights of the World Cup final. The margin here's not that drastic.
While we're waiting for more news, time for an ad break and here's something for a rainy day(-night). Get yourselves this, grab this and unfurl this one from your locker.
"I don't fancy our chances of any more play," Brydon doommongers.

9.50pm To confirm, Australia get a bonus point if there is no more play. Our Oracle reckons the cut-off is 10.20pm, so half an hour from now. Although I've heard rumours that it may be 10.30[m, nothing's official yet but about a million times less farcical than the World Cup final finish which is just playing across our screens.

10.10pm The game's off, the rain has worsened, so Australia, as expected, win by 24 runs on the D/L method, grab the bonus point and are through. Thanks for joining us today, come back on Sunday for the next round. Till then, it's goodbye from me.
Australia won by 24 runs (D/L method)
Player of the match is Michael Hussey, AUS
